title: 7.4.4 Implement chat query parsing for findings
body:
## Parent Issue
#32 - 7.4 Findings Management System

## Objective
Parse natural language queries into finding filters for chat.

## Examples
- "Show me critical findings" → severity=[critical]
- "What S3 issues do I have?" → resource_type=[s3_bucket]
- "HIPAA violations" → compliance_framework=HIPAA

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/findings.py` (_parse_chat_query method)

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
